Package com.android

Package that contains our classes we use to how to work and use enums. This code deals with Top level enums Season and SolarSystem and inner enum classes such as the private enum Planets in the SolarSystem class. Use the Main to access all the Examples which contains the code that deals with this topic To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial

    Interface Description
    Cosmic
    interface implemented by the inner enum type Planets To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial
    Movement
    interface to demonstrate how an enum implements an inteface To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Examples
    enums can't extend or be extended enums dont' allow inheritance Enums can implement an interface can't create a LOCAL enum (create an enun inside a method), you can only create an enum inside a top level class or you can create a enum inside a inner static class but not inside a normal inner class To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial
    Main
    Main class that contains our main method, calls all the code that deals with enums To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial
    SolarSystem
    an class that cotains an inner enum for 7 planets To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    AnimalTypes
    this is an enum that implements the movement interface these methods can be implemented either inside each one of the enum types or in greater enum body.
    Days
    enum that has 7 types, the 7 days of the week and has two constructors, one that takes no arguments and another that takes a string To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial
    Months
    enum consisting of months of the year if you enum has an abstract method in it, each one of your enum types HAS to have a body, to override the abstract method in here we have a abstract method in the Months enum, with the method signature abstract void absmethod(); each one of the months, has to have a body, as we have an abstract method in the enum, and each type HAS TO override that abstract method To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial
    Season
    enums are a special type of class enums are your own data types, so here we are going to create a data typ0e that has only four values WINTER,SPRING,SUMMER,AUTUMN Every enum value is implicitly static final and public SPRING is ordinal() 0 SUMMER is ordinal()1 AUTUMN is ordinal()2 WINTER is ordinal()3 To see video tutorial for this section of code Video tutorial For all 177 videos, which cover all the topics in this course go to Complete Course Video Tutorial
    Season2
    this enum implements an interface called serializable (which will be covered in chapter 8) this is just to show that a enum CAN implement an interface Serializable is a interface which allows our classes to become jar files (zipped format basically), this will be covered in details in the last chapter when we come to databases As enum is a class it also has a constructor, if no constructor is defined the default constructor is called.
    SolarSystem.Planets
    this enum type is ONLY available inside the solarsytem class, you will not be able to create a Planet outside of this class, this enum also implements the Cosmic interface, which has two method void gravity() and void move()
